name: coin-case
effect: Contains the Coins used by the Game Corner, to a maximum of 50,000.
short_effect: Holds coins for the Game Corner.

flavor_text.black_white: A case for holding coins obtained at the Game Corner. It holds up to 50,000 coins.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A case for holding coins obtained at the Game Corner. It holds up to 50,000 coins.
